channel.title: zDiddyReloaded - Release Imminent [10/07/2010, Australian Time +9.30]
channel.description:
[center][size=1][b]Revision 1.1.05[/b][/size] [img]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ujgsn7.jpg[/img] Before you read my thread please view some of these videos, taken from [url=http://youtube.com]Youtube[/url]. Unless you already know or have played zDiddyReloaded before I highly recommend watching these videos for a refference on this project thread.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GxRkQKSuzD8
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zAetwERffTo
[b]Information[/b] [i]I used the original zDiddyReloaded (or [b]ZDR[/b] as it's often called) source found by searching through these forums, a skill needed to be learnt by majority new coders & members. I've already started development, I've gotten some help from some of my mates but only enough to keep me going. Currently I am the main coder & will continue to develop this source until it's intended release date.
Everything will be cleaned out and easier to run & hopefully easier to understand. Every single skill and minigame untouched, just every single items changed to fit in with the [url=http://www.easy-share.com/1910238821/Silabsoft.zip]Silabsoft client[/url]. This was one of the first servers I played so I have a respect for it, I don't know whether this will become a decent source for new members but it's a project I hope to finish, and as my first release to the public I hope for it to be a good one. The release date will be [b]10/07/2010, Australian Time +9.30[/b] if there are no personal issues before then.[/i]
[b]Resources[/b] [img]http://img228.imageshack.us/img228/703/zdr.png[/img]
[b]Updates[/b] [i][s]Started separate folders for each character[/s] Separating characters information into separate files [s]Loading & saving changed[/s] Fixing shops items and item bonuses Cleaning out [/i][/center]

[/quote]

It’s complete but i’ve lost most hope for this forum to release.[/quote]

I agree with you but fuck off.

item.title: zDiddyReloaded - Release Imminent [10/07/2010, Australian Time +9.30]
item.dc:creator: @Three_One_Seven Three One Seven
item.description:
@Three_One_Seven wrote:

Well I have three days until my planned release, I’m going to clean ti out and attempt to make it more efficient from the coders side. Playing it should be the exact same and believe me I will work hard trying to keep that; Thank god for holidays unless this planned date would be a mess for me, I will have to pull a few all nighters to get it done within time.

I will be adding a few secrets into the game, nothing to alter game play but it will be very well hidden things that I hope only few find.

Read full topic

[center][size=1]Revision 1.1.05[/size]

Before you read my thread please view some of these videos, taken from Youtube. Unless you already know or have played zDiddyReloaded before I highly recommend watching these videos for a refference on this project thread.

Information
[i]I used the original zDiddyReloaded (or ZDR as it’s often called) source found by searching through these forums, a skill needed to be learnt by majority new coders & members. I’ve already started development, I’ve gotten some help from some of my mates but only enough to keep me going. Currently I am the main coder & will continue to develop this source until it’s intended release date.

Everything will be cleaned out and easier to run & hopefully easier to understand. Every single skill and minigame untouched, just every single items changed to fit in with the Silabsoft client. This was one of the first servers I played so I have a respect for it, I don’t know whether this will become a decent source for new members but it’s a project I hope to finish, and as my first release to the public I hope for it to be a good one. The release date will be 10/07/2010, Australian Time +9.30 if there are no personal issues before then.[/i]

Updates
Started separate folders for each character
Separating characters information into separate files
Loading & saving changed
Fixing shops items and item bonuses
